snippet.title: Mothmen 1966  - Coming July 14th
snippet.description:
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1755030/Mothmen_1966/
🦋🦋🦋 Landing July 14th, 2022 🦋🦋🦋
🦋🦋🦋 Coming to Steam, Nintendo Switch, PS4, and Xbox 🦋🦋🦋

'Pixel Pulps' are LCB Game Studio's visual novels fusing exceptional writing and stunning illustration. Inspired by mid-20th century pulp fiction and 80s home computer graphics, Mothmen 1966 is the first entry in the series and transpires during the strange occurrences of the Leonid meteor shower of 1966.

Media and content creators, please reach out to press@chorusworldwide.com for game keys.
